name: xernerx-poster
description: An extension for the xernerx framework to post bot stats to numerous bot listing sites.
author: Dummi

scripts.checks: npm i && npm audit fix --force && npm fund && npm link && tsc -w
scripts.patch: git add . && git commit -m "Version Patch" && npm version patch && npm publish && git push
scripts.minor: git add . && git commit -m "Version Upgrade" && npm version minor && npm publish && git push
scripts.major: git add . && git commit -m "Version Rewrite" && npm version major && npm publish && git push
